00074 bool BooksLoader::LoadLibraryBooks(bool debugMode, const char * inputFileName, vector<BookType> & books)
00075 {
00076 
00077         std::fstream file(inputFileName, ios::in);
00078 
00079         if(!file.is_open())
00080         {
00081                 std::cout << "File not found!\n";
00082                 return 0;
00083         }
00084 
00085         // vector of vectors of strings
00086         typedef std::vector< std::vector<std::string> > csvVector;
00087 
00088         csvVector csvData; // VVS
00089 
00090         // Populate the VVS
00091         ReadCsv reader;
00092         reader.Read(file, csvData);
00093         file.close();
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097         //    Now read through the VVS and extract data
00098         //    into the BookType objects we are making.
00099 
00100         cout << fixed << showpoint;
00101         cout << setprecision(2);
00102 
00103         string stringValue;
00104 
00105         unsigned columnCounter = 0;
00106 
00107         string title;
00108         unsigned numberOfAuthors;
00109         string * authors;
00110 
00111         string publisher;
00112         unsigned numberOfCopiesInStock;
00113         double price;
00114         long isbn;
00115 
00116         unsigned TITLE_POS = 0;
00117         unsigned AUTHC_POS = 1;
00118         unsigned MAXAUTH_POS = 0;
00119         unsigned PUBLI_POS = 0;
00120         unsigned STOCC_POS = 0;
00121         unsigned PRICE_POS = 0;
00122         unsigned ISBNL_POS = 0;
00123 
00124         // For each row of data
00125         for(csvVector::iterator csvRow = csvData.begin(); csvRow != csvData.end(); ++csvRow)
00126         {
00127                 columnCounter   = 0;
00128                 numberOfAuthors = 0;
00129                 authors = new string[4];
00130 
00131                 // For each column of data
00132                 for
00133                 (
00134                         std::vector<std::string>::iterator csvColumn = csvRow->begin(); csvColumn != csvRow->end(); ++csvColumn
00135                 )
00136                 {
00137 
00138                         //    There are between 6 and 10 columns of data in the row,
00139                         //    depending upon how many authors the book has.
00140 
00141 
00142                         if(columnCounter == TITLE_POS)
00143                         {
00144                                 // BOOK TITLE
00145                                 title = * csvColumn;
00146                                 DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(title);
00147                                 DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(title);
00148 
00149                         }
00150                         else if(columnCounter == AUTHC_POS)
00151                         {
00152                                 // NUMBER OF AUTHORS
00153                                 std::istringstream istr(*csvColumn);
00154                                 istr >> numberOfAuthors;
00155 
00156                                 // Get the positions of the remaining data for this row.
00157                                 MAXAUTH_POS = AUTHC_POS + numberOfAuthors;
00158                                 PUBLI_POS = MAXAUTH_POS + 1;
00159                                 STOCC_POS = MAXAUTH_POS + 2;
00160                                 PRICE_POS = MAXAUTH_POS + 3;
00161                                 ISBNL_POS = MAXAUTH_POS + 4;
00162 
00163                         }
00164                         else if ((columnCounter > AUTHC_POS) && (columnCounter <= MAXAUTH_POS) )
00165                         {
00166                                 // AUTHOR NAME
00167 
00168                                 unsigned authIdx = columnCounter - 2;
00169 
00170                                 string authName = *csvColumn;
00171 
00172                                 DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(authName);
00173                                 DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(authName);
00174 
00175                                 // Show what number of author this is.
00176                                 if (debugMode)
00177                                 {
00178                                         authName.append("(");
00179                                         string theIndex;
00180                                         std::stringstream ss;
00181                                         ss << authIdx;
00182                                         theIndex = ss.str();
00183                                         authName.append(theIndex);
00184                                         authName.append(")");
00185                                 }
00186 
00187                                 authors[authIdx] = authName;
00188 
00189 
00190                         }
00191                         else if(columnCounter == PUBLI_POS)
00192                         {
00193                                 // PUBLISHER
00194                                 publisher = *csvColumn;
00195                                 DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(publisher);
00196                                 DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(publisher);
00197 
00198 
00199                         }
00200                         else if(columnCounter == STOCC_POS)
00201                         {
00202                                 // NUMBER OF COPIES IN STOCK
00203                                 std::istringstream istr(*csvColumn);
00204                                 istr >> numberOfCopiesInStock;
00205 
00206 
00207                         }
00208                         else if(columnCounter == PRICE_POS)
00209                         {
00210                                 // PRICE
00211                                 std::istringstream istr(*csvColumn);
00212                                 istr >> price;
00213 
00214 
00215                         }
00216                         else if(columnCounter == ISBNL_POS)
00217                         {
00218                                 // ISBN
00219                                 std::istringstream istr(*csvColumn);
00220                                 istr >> isbn;
00221 
00222 
00223                         }
00224                         columnCounter++;
00225                 }
00226 
00227 
00228 
00229 
00230                 if (debugMode)
00231                 {
00232                         // Show book data
00233 
00234                         cout << " Title:     " << title << endl;
00235                         cout << " #Authors:  " << numberOfAuthors << endl;
00236                         cout << " Author[0]: " << authors[0] << endl;
00237                         cout << " Author[1]: " << authors[1] << endl;
00238                         cout << " Author[2]: " << authors[2] << endl;
00239                         cout << " Author[3]: " << authors[3] << endl;
00240                         cout << " Publisher: " << publisher << endl;
00241                         cout << " #Copies:   " << numberOfCopiesInStock << endl;
00242                         cout << " Price:    $" << price << endl;
00243                         cout << " ISBN:      " << isbn << endl;
00244 
00245                         cout << endl;
00246                         cout << endl;
00247                         cout << endl;
00248                 }
00249 
00250 
00251 
00252                 // Make a new book.
00253                 BookType b;
00254 
00255                 b.setTitle(title);
00256                 b.setNumberOfAuthors(numberOfAuthors);
00257                 b.setAuthorAt(authors[0], 0);
00258                 b.setAuthorAt(authors[1], 1);
00259                 b.setAuthorAt(authors[2], 2);
00260                 b.setAuthorAt(authors[3], 3);
00261                 b.setPublisher(publisher);
00262                 b.setNumberOfCopiesInStock(numberOfCopiesInStock);
00263                 b.setPrice(price);
00264                 b.setIsbn(isbn);
00265 
00266                 // Add the book
00267                 books.push_back(b);
00268 
00269                 if (debugMode)
00270                 {
00271                         cout << "Push to books" << endl;
00272                 }
00273 
00274                 delete [] authors;
00275                 authors = NULL;
00276         }
00277         return 1; // success
00278 }

00300 bool BooksLoader::SaveLibraryBooks(bool debugMode, const char * outputFileName, vector<BookType> & books)
00301 {
00302 
00303         std::fstream file(outputFileName, ios::out);
00304 
00305         if(!file.is_open())
00306         {
00307                 std::cout << "File not found!\n";
00308                 return 0;
00309         }
00310 
00311 
00312         // Write the data from all the books in the vector to the text file, using CSV format.
00313         // One book per row.
00314 
00315         vector<BookType>::iterator currentBook;
00316 
00317         for(
00318                 currentBook  = books.begin();
00319 
00320                 currentBook != books.end();
00321 
00322                 currentBook++)
00323         {
00324 
00325                 // Local variables
00326 
00327                 string   volumeTitle;
00328                 string   volumePublisher;
00329                 long     volumeIsbn;
00330                 double   volumePrice;
00331                 unsigned volumeCopies;
00332                 unsigned volumeAuthCount;
00333 
00334                 BookType b;
00335 
00336                 b = *currentBook;
00337 
00338 
00339                 // Write this record.
00340 
00341                 b.getTitle(volumeTitle);
00342                 file << volumeTitle << ", ";
00343 
00344                 b.getNumberOfAuthors(volumeAuthCount);
00345                 file << volumeAuthCount << ", ";
00346 
00347                 string authorName;
00348                 for(unsigned aaa = 0; aaa < volumeAuthCount; aaa++)
00349                 {
00350                         b.getAuthorAt(authorName, aaa);
00351                         file << authorName << ", ";
00352                 }
00353 
00354                 b.getPublisher(volumePublisher);
00355                 b.getIsbn(volumeIsbn);
00356                 b.getPrice(volumePrice);
00357                 b.getNumberOfCopiesInStock(volumeCopies);
00358 
00359                 file <<  volumePublisher << ", ";
00360                 file <<  volumeCopies    << ", ";
00361                 file <<  volumePrice     << ", ";
00362                 file <<  volumeIsbn      << ", ";
00363                 file <<  endl;
00364 
00365 
00366 
00367                 if (debugMode)
00368                 {
00369                         cout      << volumeTitle     << ", ";
00370                         cout      << volumeAuthCount << ", ";
00371 
00372                         for(unsigned aaa = 0; aaa < volumeAuthCount; aaa++)
00373                         {
00374                                 b.getAuthorAt(authorName, aaa);
00375                                 cout      << "("<<aaa<<")" << authorName << ", ";
00376                         }
00377 
00378                         cout <<  volumePublisher << ", ";
00379                         cout <<  volumeCopies    << ", ";
00380                         cout <<  volumePrice     << ", ";
00381                         cout <<  volumeIsbn      << ", ";
00382                         cout <<  endl;
00383                         cout <<  endl;
00384                 }
00385 
00386 
00387         }
00388 
00389         file.close();
00390 
00391         return 1; // success
00392 }
